input_args.passage: 'Young-Earth Creationist View Summarized And Defended | Young-earth creationists believe that the creation days of Genesis 1 were six literal (24-hour) days, which occurred 6,000–12,000 years ago.1 ...\nOld-earth or young-earth belief | CMI takes the stand that the creation is thousands of years old, based on straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
input_args.claim: 'From sources and, we can infer that CMI, and by extension Carl Wieland, adopts a young-earth creationist view that believes in six literal 24-hour creation days, which they assert occurred between 6,000 and 12,000 years ago.'
